Package camzup.pfriendly

Class MaterialPImage

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Material
camzup.core.MaterialUv
camzup.pfriendly.MaterialPImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityData, IMaterial, IOriented2, ISpatial2, IUtils, IVolume, IVolume2
public class MaterialPImage
extends MaterialUv
A material which supports PImages as textures.
